title: CareOnTheGo
description: A dissertation project discussing the following: This project investigates the current technological approach to care and its problems. Relevant information from pre-existing care applications and the approach to technology in healthcare are evaluated and explained. The main part of this project discusses the planning, design and implementation of a technological care approach, making use of current Java technologies to provide a time-management information system. The approach is tested thoroughly against its limits and the success of its effectiveness is evaluated, determining what future development should continue. Overall, the approach aims to provide a complete and concise technological approach to reducing workload on the care industry
